mapper.insert: insert into work (student, employment_unit, unit_nature, work, time, phone, contacts, contact_unit) VALUES (#{student}, #{employmentUnit}, #{unitNature}, #{work}, #{time}, #{phone}, #{contacts}, #{contactUnit})
mapper.update:
update work
student = #{student},
employment_unit = #{employmentUnit},
unit_nature = #{unitNature},
work = #{work},
time = #{time},
phone = #{phone},
contacts = #{contacts},
contact_unit = #{contactUnit},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select w.id, student, employment_unit, unit_nature, work, time, w.phone, contacts, contact_unit, si.name as studentName from work w left join student_info si on si.id = w.student order by w.id asc
